website_summaries.verdict: The circular design gives this stainless steel cast iron scrubber a user-friendly shape.
pros: Works on glass and other non-coated pots and pans
Cleans off burned bits of food without ruining the pan seasoning
Produces better results than a nylon scrubber
Easy to use for cleaning and easy to clean when you are done using
cons: This scrubber can seem a little slippery in your hands when you are using it

customer_reviews.title: I like it - use it everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, effective, and easy to use. Scrubs off anything that sticks to iron, then rinses clean. Once thing to be careful of... it seems to have an affinity for the drain hole - fish it out of the garbage disposal before turning on the garbage disposal. or you will be sorry. It just slides down to the drain and easily falls through. I just rinse it and leave it in the dish drain, but it has a handy little ring to hang if you have a hook.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Reinhart

customer_reviews.title: Clean sink must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a clean sink must-have! This knocks off leftover food particles without and harsh abrasions to your sink or dishes. I bought it to clean our cast iron pans, but it's gentle enough for my non stick cookware, and glass. It's easy to clean and doesn't leave any residue. It's just stainless steal links linked together, and so it doesn't retain food particles and get nasty. I've noticed you may have to go over some surfaces more than you would with steel wool, but it won't hurt your dishes and it's clean. It's bigger than you'd imagine from the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: I dislike the idea of buying disposable stainless steel sponges that ...
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the idea of buying disposable stainless steel sponges that always leave rust marks on my sink. This scrubber works wonderfully and doesn't rust or need to be replaced so frequently! I love it. So glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, hygienic, and durable
customer_reviews.text: No more rusting scouring pads and no more yucky food particles caught in the net mesh of plastic scrubbers. This is wonderful, practical, and I'm just sad I didn't know about chain mail scrubbers earlier. This is a good-sized sturdy link that I can see will last for years. My pots are easy to clean, and I recommend every cast-iron fan purchase this. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: booktrout

customer_reviews.title: Almost a requirement for cast iron pan owners
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I have used it on a cast iron pan and it does a better job cleaning than anything else I have tried. I also used it on the black-coated griddle on my Thermador range. It did not mar the coating but did get the grime off. The links themselves are fairly smooth so they don't scratch like steel wool. The ring on the side can be slipped over your finger to hold on to the scrubber, but if I had my druthers, I'd make the thing just a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Cut and Run

customer_reviews.title: Very effective tool!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use cast iron cookware and mountain pie irons and this product is incredible! Previously, we used sea salt, oil, and paper towels to clean, which seemed to work ok, but was time consuming. This scrubber seemed to take off baked on food particles that we thought had been removed. We love it and and will be purchasing a second one for the camper. Oh, and it also works well on stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smyth

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on stainless cookware with barkeeper's friend and on my cast iron and carbon steel. I don't use a lot of effort, I just swish it around until everything is cleaned off. I frankly do not get the bad reviews. I put in in the dishwasher to clean it. It does not scratch my stainless steel and works great. I also use it on my grill. I typically do not have burned on food. It is the best pot scrubber I have used.
customer_reviews.author: debugdiva

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Cast Iron Skillets!
customer_reviews.text: I cooked breakfast for my grandkids using my fairly new cast iron skillet and after cooking the bacon I noticed it left quite a mess in the skillet, mainly stuck on food. My wife had tried cleaning the skillet several ways, being careful not to ruin the skillet. I saw this product on Amazon and thought it sounded like it might work without ruining my skillet. My wife used the steel scrubber and she was amazed by how easy and effective this was in cleaning and not ruining the skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: How can you cook with cast iron and not have this?
customer_reviews.text: How can you cook with cast iron and not have this?!? I was lost and confused for years using cast iron and cleaning it with salt - first boiling away the stuck on stuff then using salt to scrub, scrub, scrub before a quick coat of oil. THEN THIS CAME INTO MY LIFE! Wow! What a smart tool for my kitchen! Works perfectly and quickly. Super easy to clean too with just a drop of dish soap and a rub between your hands - rinse, and you are good to go. This will last for years too, just like the cast iron pans! Thank you for making my kitchen clean up so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Auclailr

customer_reviews.title: SAD
customer_reviews.text: I use my cast iron every day, and was hoping to find an ecologically better way to clean it. This, however, was a huge bust. First, it was a little rough on the finish. But the far bigger problem is that it collects grease and is impossible to wash. It was a rancid mess after 3 days. This is probably the least useful thing on Amazon and I would have returned but it's too disgusting to ship. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UNIQUE & SANITARY
customer_reviews.text: I've only had to use this once so far. It did help me clean a stainless pan, which I could have gently used a piece of steel wool for. The 5 stars are for the absolutely awesome design of this thing. It cleans without getting any food/bits stuck in it so it's very sanitary. When spread out in a pan it's fairly large in scope then conveniently collapses into a pile taking up no space at all in the brush/sponge holder in my sink. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: AprilP

customer_reviews.title: No more worring about the side effects of the "modern" non stick cookware!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a larger version of this steel mwsh scrubber and it was way too bulky . This is the perfect easy to use scrubber for my casy iron frying pans, ducht oven and griddle. This scrubber doesn't ruin the patina and my pans are completly non stick now. I do recomemd to avoid soap, a good scrub with hot water is just enough, then dry on the stove for a minute or two and rub a bit of oil. Voila!! Non stick and healthy cast iron like grandma used to have!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonita

customer_reviews.title: Works good, love the hanging ring
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my cast iron pan. Soak the stuff in some water and take this scrubber to it. Afterward, put a little dish soap on the scrubber and just roll it around in your hand and rinse to clean the scrubber. I love the little ring on the side, because I have hooks over my sink and I just hang it up there to drip dry.
customer_reviews.author: SBPTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: it works well and it stays a lot cleaner than ...
customer_reviews.text: it works well and it stays a lot cleaner than the old steel scrubbers but the center ring is in the way when using it especially with my arthritic hands it makes it hard to use otherwise I have no problem and know it will last me the rest of my life without rusting or falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: joan cummins

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: For cleaning cast iron this leaves a lot to be desired. The old fashion stainless steel scrubbing pads work much better.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Scan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product that performs beyond expectations. Update: I've used the Chainmail Scrubber for nearly a month now and it's performed very well. No only have I used it for my cast iron pans, but it works well on stainless steel as well. It cleans easily. Just squirt a little dish washing detergent on it and working the suds through it and rinse. I shake the water out and hang it up to dry. It's ready for the next time I use it. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Effective, gentle, different
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly effective. Looks like it will last forever. I hang it by the small loop. It is not at all like the steel wool type scrubbers. Will not polish but is excellent for getting off big gobs of stuck on stuff. Is gentle on my hand.
customer_reviews.author: miacid

customer_reviews.title: Great way to clean cast iron cookware
customer_reviews.text: This steel scrubber has been keeping my skillets perfectly clean. No scratching or removing the seasoning. The surface has become perfectly seasoned because I don't scratch it away with abrasive scrubbers since I've started using this.
customer_reviews.author: STACI BOLDEN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading up on products useful to clean aluminium vessels. I must say I am very surprised at how great it is at cleaning up the leftover stains on the said vessel. My only concern was if it would start rusting but its been a few months no and no sign of that so far. Very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sanchali

customer_reviews.title: Works as claimed
customer_reviews.text: It really cleans our iron cookware very well and does it without disturbing the seasoning. One note of caution; there has been some stuck on debris it had a hard time with but that was solved by boiling water in the pan. Other than that minor quibble, this is well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: We USED to be green scrubby users
customer_reviews.text: My wife wouldn't use this at first, she actually rolled her eyes when I first showed it to her... But as soon as she saw me using it and how easily it took care of stuff stuck on the stainless steel, she got rid of the stinky green scrubby on the kitchen sink. I'll be getting another to put in with the camping gear to use on the cast iron. Awesome product, this thing will probably last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to nasty sponges that get ruined from campfir soot.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for camping to use on my cast iron pots. Due to the two feet of snow Washington just got, i sadly have not been able to use it yet. It looks durable and well made. A little bigger in diameter than i was expecting but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Paradise*Gardens

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron cleaner
customer_reviews.text: quality of scrubber is great. not as easy to use as I thought. If used on a regular basis it would be easier, but I tried on years of neglect to get off many years of use. it will be a work on process. Works well but not a magic cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Donny from RI

customer_reviews.title: Great on my SS
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something reusable for long term use. Something I wouldn't have to throw away every few weeks and spend money on a replacement. This works great on my stainless steel pots and pans. I'm happy to be saving money and even happier this works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Hahn-Galioto

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for cast iron!
customer_reviews.text: This gadget works so well to clean my cast iron skillets! I would highly recommend if you cook with cast iron a lot like I do. (Pretty much every meal) But keep an eye on it. Mine fell in my garbage disposal and now my disposal is broken. My fault completely, this is just a PSA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This works great cleaning pans to a point but usually still have to regress back to the SOS pad for a final round. I love how you can put it in the dishwasher to clean. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The high quality is better than expected. No sharp edges, like the cheap disposable ones. It will be a favored gadget in my kitchen, especially for my cast iron and my carbon steel wok. I was happy to find this little treasure. Thanks. Laurie
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This makes cleaning my cast iron skillets so easy. I really kick myself for not finding a product like this that makes cleaning cast iron so easy earlier. I haven't had any trouble getting any residue removed from the skillets with this scrubber.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Simply Great
customer_reviews.text: How did someone come one come up with this? I use it for every other stubborn pot and whatever cleaning task when all else fails. It’s got a goofy hand feel.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Granger

customer_reviews.title: Makes easy work of dirty pots.
customer_reviews.text: This scrubber has already been invaluable in my kitchen. I originally bought it because I make my own dog food and the bottom of my stockpot is always difficult to clean afterward. This made easy work of it and will save me from wasting steel wool pads or sponges in the future. But it has also been incredible in cleaning the brown bits that have forever been on my Pyrex cookware. It's strong, easy to use, and is not sharp on my hands. I hang it on a tack in the cabinet under the sink and use it quite regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M Millwater

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works and would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have been switching over to cast iron pans and was having trouble getting them clean like I wanted. I came across these chainmail scrubber and use kosher salt and it does a great job of getting everything out. I then the scrubber into the dishwasher and am done. I also use the scrubber on glass brownie pans and on similar things. Get the biggest one you think you can handle.
customer_reviews.author: MacGyver's

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. I didn't give 5 stars fir durability seeing as I haven't had it long. One thing I'm not sure of is if it's made out of steel because it's not magnetic at all as all steel is. It wouldn't cling to my knife magnet nor would a magnet cling to the "steel" product.
customer_reviews.author: indeed!

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Cast Iron
customer_reviews.text: If you have cast iron you should have one of these. This steel scrubber easily removes stuck on foods with a minimal amount of effort. Rinses clean and does not hold food particles.
customer_reviews.author: Kneata

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly my expectations where low but I am very pleased with this purchase. We use primarily cast iron and stainless cookware and this scrubber is awesome. I catch myself doing all of the dishes using this scrubber. The only negative is that a few of the links come apart every once in a while but not a hard repair and understandingly the nature of the beast.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Nice scrubber!
customer_reviews.text: I like is, as ling as it stays out of the garbage disposal I should be ok!
customer_reviews.author: MICK686

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Cast Iron
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Didn't expect it to be so flat. It isn't round like the photo would suggest or one might think a cleaning pad would be. Needed something to get my cast iron pan clean and this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Sound Diva

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little kitchen helper
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap, this thing really works! It's actually definite buy. :) So happy we switched to cast iron and now can clean it with this.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have never used anything but something similar to a Brillo pad but I have to say this, I was extremely surprised at the ease of using this and it removed everything without a problem. About one minute of medium pressure and it removed every bit of scorched food that was on the pan. Also they got here in record time in professional packaging. Completely happy with everything. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: James p Murchison

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit better than using steel wool
customer_reviews.text: Item came and works well enough. It's a bit better than using steel wool, and I am certain it will last longer, but it in general doesn't take off too much time from the time it takes to clean cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sankovich

customer_reviews.title: Good scrubber
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done on my cast iron pot. Makes clean up a bit easier. Worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: My cast iron says thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Pour some salt in your still warm cast iron and rub it down with this puppy and it’s smooth sailing.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute to steel wool
customer_reviews.text: If you have cast iron pans or are a home brewer this is a must have tool. It has changed the we we clean and we don't have to replace steel wool anymore. Earth friendly:)
customer_reviews.author: Treelover

customer_reviews.title: Pro's and con's
customer_reviews.text: Great for removing food matter quickly and easily. And easy to keep it clean (unlike conventional steel wool which gets food stuck in it), but not great for removing burnt on marks and discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: I am delighted that I got it
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a scrubber and salt to clean my cast iron skillet and griddle. They worked but when the skillet was hot, the scrubber seemed to melt every so slightly, and it was hard to get into the grooves on the griddle. The stainless steel cleaner solved both of these problems. It is simple to use -- a quick scouring and the pans are clean, and the grooves on the griddle are quickly cleaned out and the raised portions scrapped clean by the cleaner. I am delighted that I got it, and have ordered one to give to a relative who uses cast iron cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Strayer

customer_reviews.title: Scratches Non-Stick and Enamel.
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this on nonstick or enamel. Immediately leaves visible scratches. I bought this because the product description specifically says it’s safe for non-stick, but it 100% isn’t. I’ll keep it for when I eventually resurface my cast iron, but that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I dont think this product will disapoint anyone !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have prodocut for every kitchen !! It is the best way to clean many hard surfaces but on cast iron its the best way to clean and preserve the seasoning. Ill be give some away as gifts because i want my friends to have a product that will last a lifetime and therefore will remember me as well. I do a lot of camping and this is a must have product for me.
customer_reviews.author: ItsRichard

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my brother-in-law as a gift. So far, he loves it. I looked it over carefully and didn't see any links with a gap. It certainly does the job.
customer_reviews.author: PersistantKitty

customer_reviews.title: Works great for life
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Don't get grease stuck to it, not fun to get off. Sturdy and feels like a life long product
customer_reviews.author: G, Texas

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THAT IT DOES NOT RUST AND REALLY CLEANS YOUR POTS AND PANS
customer_reviews.author: Paula Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: It worked!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally used the cleaner. It really worked great! I used it to clean the heavily burnt stew on the bottom of my Le Creuset pot. No scratches and I was happy I didn't have to deal with the usual yucky clogged sponge or steel wool pad. Money well spent and hope it'll last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Mingster

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Gentle Scrubber
customer_reviews.text: This scrubber works great on my new wok. I can clean the wok without having to disturbing the surface seasoning too much..
customer_reviews.author: Garthur

customer_reviews.title: You will be happy you bought this (easy to clean/rust free) tool
customer_reviews.text: Let's say you royally ruined your beloved cast iron cookware. You will be happy you bought this (easy to clean/rust free) tool. This stainless steel scrubber will enable you to reset your cast iron seasoning back to the day when you first bought it. I noticed a black residue that kept coming off after usage. However, after a thorough cleaning with salt (as an abrasive), a coarse sponge in water, and a few finishing coats with flaxseed oil in the oven, the black residue no longer showed up. At the time of purchase, it was my first time using and getting acquainted with a cast iron pan, so it wasn't long before I needed this scrubber. VERY effective!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Good for the cast iron skillet which usually lays waste to my regular scrubbers.
customer_reviews.author: Angela F

customer_reviews.title: ... this cast iron scrubber which I use frequently and like very much
customer_reviews.text: I already had this cast iron scrubber which I use frequently and like very much. I bought this one for my 89 year old mother whose own mother had one 80 years ago. They called it the iron dish rag. My mother was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Leslie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good durability- has trouble with really stuck-on food.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scrubber for certain kinds of food, but it has problems with particular things that burn on to cast irons - particularly ground beef, in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: May W

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my cast iron skillet and dutch oven.It is like chain mail.Seems to work best when item your cleaning is still a little hot..Does not seem to affect seasoning.I love it.Throw it in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: randall o.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this as a fidgeting toy rather than for it's intended use, but I imagine it makes a good scrubber, too. It's high quality and sturdy, and the size is as advertised. The finger rings are about right for average sized hands, and the chainmail rings are all closed fairly well. Overall great product, no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Great scrubber
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my dad and ended up coming back to buy one for my brother's and myself. I love it for my cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great gentle cleaning tool.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on cast iron and carbon steel without removing the nonstick seasoning. Doesn't rust.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing invention!
customer_reviews.text: If you have uncoated pots and pans, or cast iron cookware, this is amazing! I makes quick work of even the most dried on food!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Staples

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love the size. The round shape is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cherylmsf

customer_reviews.title: You must try it.
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is very easy to use and clean. I hang it on acommandhookto drip drip and it’s ready for the next use.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy G-ma

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for cleaning tough spots on cast iron and other dishes and it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Layla Sol

customer_reviews.title: great tool but price up 40% when I went to purchase again as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This is great for cleaning cast iron cookware, and when it gets dirty you can just throw it in the dishwasher. I bought mine in March of 2017 and in November of 2017 the price had gone up over 40%, so that is the only drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and keep clean!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly new to cast iron, but I can tell that your Steel Scrubber will be around as long my new skillet. Very simple, very well built. I use it every single day. Best of all for me is that it's very easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: K. Staelens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Hasn't rusted. Does the job well. Excellent product. Will post an update if it starts going nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Thoth9000

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cast Iron Pans
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it daily on my cast iron pans. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do much for my manicure but it cleans the skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Cleans very well and doesn’t spoil the coating of the vessel
customer_reviews.author: Kiran V

customer_reviews.title: Totally love it-best scrubber for cast iron(I've tried them all ) ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally love it-best scrubber for cast iron(I've tried them all ) plus easy on the hands & cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Alyce Fritch

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning made easy
customer_reviews.text: Clean cast iron cookware and maintain the seasoning just made easier with this Chainmail Scrubber. I finally had success cleaning a stubborn build up on my stove top as well. I recommend this to anyone who has cast iron cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Swett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scrubber!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this scrubber. It's just the right size and works Sooo awesome!! well worth the money!!!! I would highly suggest buying this for your cast iron pans!! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: LisaE

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This works well with my cleaning cast iron when I have cooked meatloaf. Arrived when stated. I am satisfied. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: annswilli

customer_reviews.title: Like how it's sustainable and won't need to be thrown ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to hold, but it works. Like how it's sustainable and won't need to be thrown out every few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for cleaning cast iron!
customer_reviews.text: This scrubber makes short work of cleaning my cast iron skillet. I use a plastic scraper and follow it with this stainless steel chain mail scrubber to pick up anything that might of been left. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Holle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Gets everything off pans and dishes and doesn't get stinky like a sponge - I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: When removed from packaging, dozens of the links fell off because they weren't closed all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R Sirek

customer_reviews.title: Giving it another shot
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't impressed with my first one, but the company has great customer support is and sending me a second to try again. to be fair i didn't use it on cast iron, only stainless steel
customer_reviews.author: EJones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for cast iron. It does scrub well
customer_reviews.author: Ulua.kayak

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tool to help clean my cookware
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to help clean my cookware. It's well made, pliable and easy to clean after it's used. I use it to help clean my cast iron pans and BBQ Planche grill and it does a great job. Sponges with a scrubber get caked with grease and grime and don't clean easily unlike this cleaner. I've only had it a month or so but so far I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leam

customer_reviews.title: Just great.
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully. Be Carovel not to drop it down your garbage Bozal by accident! My wife do that, and that was a bad mistake! That is not the fault of the product.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES D LARSON

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT clean cast iron or stainless steel!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your $ !!! Does NOT clean cast iron or stainless steel!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with Pyrex bakeware.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to clean baked on food on my Pyrex. Doesn’t scratch the glass and I don’t have to scrub as hard. Cleans up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: It seemed strange at first that this would work, ...
customer_reviews.text: It seemed strange at first that this would work, but it did and it still does, I use it all the time. I think it's made of stainless steel because it does not rust.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on my cast iron...high quality and no rust.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Chainmail Scrubber is a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love my cast iron cookware, but I've never felt I had a good way to clean it. Your Chainmail Scrubber has solved that problem for me. I'm able to really clean my cookware thoroughly without affecting its seasoning. As a result I am using all of my cast iron more often. I have Irish Soda Bread in my skillet in the oven as we speak. Your Scrubber is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Worked well; easy to scrub with, easy to store
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my sponge to clean my cast iron pans, but they get grimed up pretty easily. This cleaned the pans more quickly and without damage to the pans or the sponge. Easy to rinse off afterward and hang up for the next use.

customer_reviews.text: This works very well. It's a little awkward to hold so I don't use it for everything, but I love it for the baked on stuff.

product_meta.title: Cast Iron Cleaner. Steel Scrubber - Cookware Cleaner For Skillet, Wok, Pot, Pan | Hygenic Option to Scouring Pad | Does Not Rust like Steel Wool | Home & Camping | Protects Cookware Seasoning
product_meta.description: The amazing cast iron cleaner is the ideal way of effectively cleaning your cast iron, stainless steel, Pyrex and other non-coated cookware without ruining the finish or seasoning. An innovative cast iron cleaner that is easy to use and will get rid of those stubborn stuck-on food particles. A hygienic way of cleaning your cookware without worrying about continuously replacing germ-infested sponges and scraper pads. But don't take our word for it, 'add to cart' Now, you are backed by our 90 day money back .
feature_bullets: Premium quality - unlike other chainmail scrubbers this cast iron cleaner is built with best stainless steel Type (316L) in the food industry for superior corrosion resistance and precisely handcrafted into a smooth circular shape to limit cookware abrasion and maintain surface finish & seasoning. ★ 90 day money back ★

Easy to use, clean and store - high surface area coverage with large size. Circular design follows hand profile for easy handling, user friendly. Center & outer rings enable superior grip. Ergonomic design, chainmail Links size enables effective cleaning whilst reducing bits caught in mesh. Store in bag, hang via outer ring or place over silverware basket. ★ dishwasher safe ★

Multi-compatible - safely use on Cast iron, stainless steel, copper, Pyrex and other non-coated cookware without damaging finish or seasoning. Travel-friendly, lightweight, flexible and easy to fit into bag. Compatible with grills ( Bbq, hibachi & smoker grill), griddle, grate, skillet, Dutch oven, casserole dish, kitchen sinks, cooktop, ovens, wok, Saucier, paella pan and pots & pans ( Saucepan).

Durable & hygienic - stainless steel 316L is food safe and ultra-hygienic, unlike conventional germ-infested scrubbers (E. G. Sponges and scouring pads). save money with this reusable cleaning tool. Repeatedly use with no bad smell, no scrubber fibers sticking to cookware and no metal flaking off scraper during cleaning.

– only hot water needed to remove even stubborn food bits, No harmful detergents required. A heavy-duty scrubber that is sustainable and can be used repeatedly without having any concern of damage or need for replacement.
